name: Drive Zombie Mountain
description:
It is a game to go to the goal after collecting 100 zombies while avoiding huge zombies.

Accelerator: w

Retreat: S

Right: D

Left: A

Nitro: shift

Camera mark: Viewpoint change

Bomb Mark: Grenade

Round arrow: Reposition

P mark: Pause

Because it is a trial version, you can play only one stage. There is a free retail version on Google play.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.twael.BreakZombieMountain
